member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.FileBufferingReadStream
member.summary: A Stream that wraps another stream and enables rewinding by buffering the content as it is read. The content is buffered in memory up to a certain size and then spooled to a temp file on disk. The temp file will be deleted on Dispose.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.FormReader
member.summary: Used to read an 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' form.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.FormReader.ReadNextPair
member.summary: Reads the next key value pair from the form. For unbuffered data use the async overload instead.
member.returns: The next key value pair, or null when the end of the form is reached.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.FormReader.ReadNextPairAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously reads the next key value pair from the form.
member.returns: The next key value pair, or null when the end of the form is reached.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.FormReader.ReadForm(System.String)
member.summary: Parses text from an HTTP form body.
member.param: The HTTP form body to parse.
member.returns: The collection containing the parsed HTTP form body.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.FormReader.ReadFormAsync(System.IO.Stream,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Parses an HTTP form body.
member.param: The HTTP form body to parse.
member.returns: The collection containing the parsed HTTP form body.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.FormReader.ReadFormAsync(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Parses an HTTP form body.
member.param: The HTTP form body to parse.
member.returns: The collection containing the parsed HTTP form body.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.MultipartReader.HeaderLengthLimit
member.summary: The limit for individual header lines inside a multipart section.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.MultipartReader.TotalHeaderSizeLimit
member.summary: The combined size limit for headers per multipart section.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.MultipartReaderStream.#ctor(Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.BufferedReadStream,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a stream that reads until it reaches the given boundary pattern.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.MultipartSection.BaseStreamOffset
member.summary: The position where the body starts in the total multipart body. This may not be available if the total multipart body is not seekable.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.QueryHelpers.AddQueryString(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Append the given query key and value to the URI.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.WebEncoders
member.summary: Contains utility APIs to assist with common encoding and decoding operations.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.WebEncoders.Base64UrlDecode(System.String)
member.summary: Decodes a base64url-encoded string.
member.returns: The base64url-decoded form of the input.
member.remarks: The input must not contain any whitespace or padding characters. Throws FormatException if the input is malformed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.WebEncoders.Base64UrlDecode(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decodes a base64url-encoded substring of a given string.
member.param: A string containing the base64url-encoded input to decode.
The position in at which decoding should begin.
The number of characters in to decode.
member.returns: The base64url-decoded form of the input.
member.remarks: The input must not contain any whitespace or padding characters. Throws FormatException if the input is malformed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.WebEncoders.Base64UrlEncode(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encodes an input using base64url encoding.
member.returns: The base64url-encoded form of the input.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.WebEncoders.Base64UrlEncode(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes an input using base64url encoding.
member.param: The offset into at which to begin encoding.
The number of bytes of to encode.
member.returns: The base64url-encoded form of the input.

member.summary: HTML-encodes a character array and writes the result to the supplied output.
member.remarks: The encoded value is also appropriately encoded for inclusion inside an HTML attribute as long as the attribute value is surrounded by single or double quotes.

member.summary: HTML-encodes a given input string.
member.returns: The HTML-encoded value, or null if the input string was null.
member.remarks: The return value is also appropriately encoded for inclusion inside an HTML attribute as long as the attribute value is surrounded by single or double quotes.

member.summary: Returns a bitmap of all characters which are defined per version 7.0.0 of the Unicode specification.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.Encoders.UnicodeHelpers.GetScalarValueFromUtf16(System.Char*,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Given a UTF-16 character stream, reads the next scalar value from the stream. Set 'endOfString' to true if 'pChar' points to the last character in the stream.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.Encoders.UnicodeHelpers.GetUtf8RepresentationForScalarValue(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Given a Unicode scalar value, returns the UTF-8 representation of the value. The return value's bytes should be popped from the LSB.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.Encoders.UnicodeHelpers.IsCharacterDefined(System.Char)
member.summary: Returns a value stating whether a character is defined per version 7.0.0 of the Unicode specification. Certain classes of characters (control chars, private use, surrogates, some whitespace) are considered "undefined" for our purposes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebUtilities.Encoders.UnicodeHelpers.IsSupplementaryCodePoint(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether the given scalar value is in the supplementary plane and thus requires 2 characters to be represented in UTF-16 (as a surrogate pair).
